languages.text: "Причащенным Истинной плотью не страшны увечья, обрывающие существование простых слуг. Благость Омниссии дала мне шанс пережить страсти и воспрять к новому служению".

"Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."
languages.original_text: "Причащенным Истинной плотью не страшны увечья, обрывающие существование простых слуг. Благость Омниссии дала мне шанс пережить страсти и воспрять к новому служению".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “那些与实肉共融的人不会惧怕残害，因为那样的残害只会缩短低阶仆人的寿命。欧姆尼塞亚仁慈地赐予了我祝福，帮助我战胜血肉的苦弱，开始新的服务。”
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: “那些与实肉共融的人不会惧怕残害，因为那样的残害只会缩短低阶仆人的寿命。欧姆尼塞亚仁慈地赐予了我祝福，帮助我战胜血肉的苦弱，开始新的服务。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ceux qui communient avec la chair véritable ne craignent pas le genre de mutilations qui mettraient d'ordinaire un terme à l'existence de serviteurs inférieurs. La bénédiction de l'Omnimessie me permet de ne pas dépendre de la fragilité corporelle et de pouvoir ainsi le servir en toutes circonstances. »
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui communient avec la chair véritable ne craignent pas le genre de mutilations qui mettraient d'ordinaire un terme à l'existence de serviteurs inférieurs. La bénédiction de l'Omnimessie me permet de ne pas dépendre de la fragilité corporelle et de pouvoir ainsi le servir en toutes circonstances. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Quienes comulgamos con la verdadera carne no tememos la mutilación que finalizaría la existencia de sirvientes menores. La bondad del Omnissiah me ha dado la bendición de sobrevivir a la fragilidad corpórea y alcanzar nuevas cotas de servicio».
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: «Quienes comulgamos con la verdadera carne no tememos la mutilación que finalizaría la existencia de sirvientes menores. La bondad del Omnissiah me ha dado la bendición de sobrevivir a la fragilidad corpórea y alcanzar nuevas cotas de servicio».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「真の肉体と一体になった者は、切断を恐れることなく下級従者の存在を終わらせる。万機神の恩恵が、長命な肉体の弱さと新たな奉仕を許しているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: 「真の肉体と一体になった者は、切断を恐れることなく下級従者の存在を終わらせる。万機神の恩恵が、長命な肉体の弱さと新たな奉仕を許しているのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wer in Kommunion mit dem Wahren Fleisch lebt, der fürchtet keine Verstümmelungen, die das Leben niederer Diener verkürzen würden. Das Wohlwollen des Omnissiah hat mich mit der Gabe gesegnet, körperliche Schwäche zu überleben und zu einem neuen Dienst aufzusteigen."
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: "Wer in Kommunion mit dem Wahren Fleisch lebt, der fürchtet keine Verstümmelungen, die das Leben niederer Diener verkürzen würden. Das Wohlwollen des Omnissiah hat mich mit der Gabe gesegnet, körperliche Schwäche zu überleben und zu einem neuen Dienst aufzusteigen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

languages.text: "Salt Suret'le görüş birliğinde olanlar, düşük hizmetkârların varlığını sona erdirebilecek kesiklerden korkmaz. Hermesih'in cömertliği, bana bedensel zaafları bir kenara bırakma ve yeni bir hizmet için yükselme lütfunu bağışladı."
languages.original_text: "Those in communion with the True Flesh do not fear the mutilations that would cut short the existence of lowlier servants. The beneficence of the Omnissiah has granted me the blessing of outliving corporeal frailty and rising to new service."

traits.locale_text: "Salt Suret'le görüş birliğinde olanlar, düşük hizmetkârların varlığını bitirebilecek kesiklerden korkmaz. Hermesih'in cömertliği, bana bedensel zaafları bir kenara bırakma ve yeni bir hizmet için yükselme lütfunu bağışladı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
